description: Get all important information about a mission, in the mission window.
name: Missionhelper

water_needed.text: Water needed: {n} litre | Water needed: {n} litres

normal.description: Shows the probability of which a vehicle will be requested.
normal.title: Show Probabilities

credits.description: Indicates average credit income from an assignment.
credits.title: Credits

expansions.description: Lists possible spread of this mission.
expansions.title: Spreads

followup.description: Lists possible follow-up uses for this mission.
followup.title: Follow-up missions

generatedBy.description: Shows the mission categories that are used to select a generating building.
generatedBy.title: Generated by (mission categories)

hide_battalion_chief_vehicles.description: Hides Support Vehicle completely and shows only MCV.
hide_battalion_chief_vehicles.title: Hide Support Vehicle

hoverTip.description: Tooltips for as example the overlay button.
hoverTip.title: Tooltips

id.description: Shows the Mission ID next to the title.
id.title: Mission ID

battalion_chief_vehicles.description: Subtracts the number of required MCV from  Support Vehicles and  hides Support Vehicles if the number drops below 0.
battalion_chief_vehicles.title: Support Vehicle Simple Rate

heavy_rescue_vehicles.description: Subtracts the number of required Fire Engines from the Major Rescue Vehicle and hides Fire Engines if the number drops below 0. This function is intended for people who drive a pure Rescue Pumper system.
heavy_rescue_vehicles.title: Major Rescue Vehicle Simple Rate

platform_trucks.description: Subtracts the number of Fire Engines from the Aerial Pumpers and hides Fire Engines if the number drops below 0.
platform_trucks.title: Aerial Pumper Simple Rate

noVehicleRequirements.description: Set here which special requirements to show, if they exist for that mission.
noVehicleRequirements.title: Special requirements

allow_arff_instead_of_lf.description: Indicates, if instead of a firetruck ULFV are possible on site.
allow_arff_instead_of_lf.title: Show if ULFV are allowed as firetrucks

allow_police_motorcycle_instead_of_fustw.description: Enabling this shows when a motorbike can replace a police car
allow_police_motorcycle_instead_of_fustw.title: Police Motorbike can replace Police Car

allow_rw_instead_of_lf.description: Indicates, if instead of a Fire Engine also Major Rescue Vehicle or Rescue Pumper is possible on site.
allow_rw_instead_of_lf.title: Show Major Rescue Vehicle / Rescue Pumper instead of firetrucks

critical_care.description: Shows the possible Intensive Care Chance
critical_care.title: Details of possible Intensive Chances

hideWhenNoNeed.description: Hides the patient details if there are no more patients and patients do not appear until the end of the assignment.
hideWhenNoNeed.title: Show patient details only when needed

live.description: Shows at the top of the mission helper how many patients the mission currently has.
live.title: Number of current patients

patient_allow_first_responder_chance.description: Shows with how much % any vehicle is sufficient to treat.
patient_allow_first_responder_chance.title: First Responder Probability

title.description: Shows the heading "Patients" above the details about possible patients.
title.title: Patients (Title)

place.description: Shows next to the title which POI is required for this mission.
place.title: POI

prerequisites.description: Shows the requirements (e.g. 3 rescue stations and 4 fire stations)
prerequisites.title: Prerequisites

live.description: Shows at the top of the mission helper how many prisoners the mission currently has.
live.title: Number of current prisoners

title.description: Shows the heading "Prisoners" above the details about possible prisoners.
title.title: Prisoners (Title)

subsequent.description: Lists possible Subsequent missions on succes.
subsequent.title: Subsequent mission

title.description: Shows the mission name, e.g. "Trashcan fire" as title.
title.title: mission name

type.description: Shows the type number of the mission next to the title.
type.title: Type number

patient_additionals.description: If there are currently more than 10 patients on site, Paramedic Supervisor is automatically listed at the beginning of the vehicle requirements.
patient_additionals.title: Mention Paramedic Supervisor extra

sort.caption: Name of the requirement
sort.description: Define what the vehicle requirements should be sorted by.
sort.title: Sorting the vehicle requirements

sortDesc.description: Sorts vehicle requirements in a descending order.
sortDesc.title: Vehicles in descending Order

title.description: Displays the heading "Vehicles" above the vehicle requirements.
title.title: Vehicles (Title)

xAfterNumber.description: Puts an x behind the amount of vehicles
xAfterNumber.title: x behind amount
